.html_header_transparency #top .avia-builder-el-0 .container, .html_header_transparency #top .avia-builder-el-0 .slideshow_inner_caption{padding-top:88px;}
body{font-family:'Kameron', 'HelveticaNeue', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;}
h1 {
color: #f16549 !important;
font-weight:200;
font-size: 32px;
margin-bottom: 10px;
text-transform: none !important;
line-height: 1.4em;
letter-spacing:1px !important;
font-family: Helvetica Neue, helveticaneue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif !important;
}

h2 {
color: #A29896;
font-weight:200;
font-size: 22px;
margin-bottom: 10px;
text-transform: none !important;
line-height: 1.4em;
letter-spacing:1px !important;
font-family: Helvetica Neue, helveticaneue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif !important;
}

p {
margin: 0.85em 0;
font-size: 15px;
line-height: 1.6em;
}

.main_menu ul:first-child > li > a {
display: block;
text-decoration: none;
padding: 0 13px;
font-weight: normal;
font-weight: normal;
font-size: 16px;
}

h3
{
font-family: Helvetica Neue, helveticaneue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif !important;

font-weight: 200;
font-size: 22px;
letter-spacing: 1px;
line-height: 1.4em;
}

#top div .avia-gallery img {
float: left;
border-style: solid;
border-width: 0px !important;
padding: 1px;
width: 100%;
border-radius: 0;
}

.small-preview {
width: 150px !important;
height: 150px !important;
overflow: hidden;
border-radius: 4px;
float: left;
margin: 6px 0 0 0;
position: relative;
text-align: center;
line-height: 81px;
position: relative;
z-index: 4;
display: block;
}

#mc_signup_submit {
margin-top: 0px !important;
width: 100% !important;
}

#mc_subheader {
line-height: 1.5em !important;
margin-bottom: 18px !important;
font-size: 15px !important;
}

#CDSWIDSSP {
max-width: 200px !important;
}

/*===RETAIL/PARTY PLATTER FORMS====*/

span.wpcf7-not-valid-tip {
    color: #f00 !important;
}

.form-left { float: left; }

.form-right { 
float: left; 
margin-left: 25px;
}

.clear-float { clear: both; }

h3.clear-float {
padding: 30px 0px 10px 0px;
    text-transform: uppercase;
}

.choose-type-form input[type="text"] {
margin-bottom: 0px !important;
}

p.clear-float, p.form-left, p.form-right {
margin: 0px !important;
}

p.clear-float {
padding-top: 10px;
}

/*MOBILE=====================================*/

@media only screen and (max-width: 767px) {

.form-right { 
margin-left: 0px;
}


}
.container {width:100%;} .container .av-content-small.units {width:73%; }
			
			  .responsive .boxed#top , .responsive.html_boxed.html_header_sticky #header{ width: 1130px; max-width:90%; }
			  .responsive .container{ max-width: 1130px; }
